Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 20th overall pick, by Syracuse in 1979...
Had first career hit on 8/26/1980, off Bronc Burnett (PEN)...
Hit first career homerun on 7/31/1982, off Oliver Maldonado (HAL)...
Drove in 6 runs against Malibu on 6/11/1987...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/14/1987, hitting .533 with 1 HR, 4 RBI...
Injured on 5/8/1988 with a Hyper Extended Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/28/1988, hitting .476 with 1 HR, 7 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Boston (UBA) on 2/5/1989 to a 3-year deal worth $1,550,000 per year...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/1989, hitting .419 with 3 HR, 22 RBI...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
Injured on 5/4/1990 with a Concussion, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 6/24/1990 with a Sore Back, out for one week...
Drove in 6 runs against Minnesota on 7/24/1990...
